attributes.action: Create laws to ensure that a manifesto is adhered to after an election
attributes.additional_details: The current government failed on the delivery of its manifesto, and obtained power on the back of empty pledges. This can’t happen again
attributes.background: Ensure laws are in place to hold parties accountable for their manifesto, and ensure they honour its pledges, from which they gained election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
